revised_title: Nerves and Nervous Plexuses of the Gravid Uterus
tldr: The author, Robert Lee, conducted a study on the nerves and nervous plexuses of the gravid uterus. He observed the distribution of nerves and their connection with the uterine veins, and described the presence of fasciculated bands on the uterus's posterior surface. Lee concluded that these bands were part of the uterus's special nervous system.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive System
